Title: 41954 - # Ways Non-Traditional Students Can Prepare for College
Direction: 675 words. Make a list of 4 to 8 ways non-traditional students can prepare for college. There are a lot of subjects you can cover (many are mentioned in the resource links). For instance, you can discuss saving money so it doesn't put a big strain on the family budget; taking a few pass/fail classes to get accustomed to college campuses; and enrolling in online courses. You can include the client URL and keyword in a section about how selling Amway products teaches people skills like organization, public speaking, and bookkeeping. Your audience is interested in making and saving money, so emphasize the connection between earning a degree and higher income.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: saving money with Amway

Title: 41957 - # Ways to Build Financial Security
Direction: 675 words. Make a list of 4 to 8 ways people can build financial security. The resource links mention suggestions like saving money, following a budget, and buying insurance policies. You can include the client link and keyword in a section about earning extra money by selling Amway products. Your audience is interested in saving money.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: making extra money working with Amway

Title: 41961 - # Ways to Build Skills for a Better Job
Direction: 675 words. Write a list of 4 to 8 ways people can build skills so they can qualify for better, higher paying jobs. You may want to include options such as taking online classes, taking on more responsibility at work, and taking advantage of volunteer opportunities. You can include the client link and keyword in a section about how selling Amway products teaches people about sales, money management, etc. Your audience is interested in financial security.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: gaining skills selling Amway products
